Oke heads-up everyone to bypass online registration/activation add this into you register.

32bit

REGEDIT4
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\CyberLink\PowerDVD11\CustomReg]
â€œUI_UpgradeStrategyâ€=dword:00000000

x64:

REGEDIT4
[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\CyberLink\PowerDVD11\CustomReg]
â€œUI_UpgradeStrategyâ€=dword:00000000

Windows 7:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\CyberLink\PowerDVD11\CustomReg

installer not working in my windows 7 sp1 .
The installshield saying "IDS_CL_LOAD_FAIL".
Can any one suggest me something???

For the people still wondering if it work. the answer is YES. How? just like stun have mention fix it in regedit. Go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\CyberLink\PowerDVD11\CustomReg > Find ( UI_UpgradeStrategy ) double click it change whatever # in it to 0. Then type in the serial provided. that should work.
will it be activated permanently??

After successfully register I have this s*it and I do not know what should I do:

http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/4002/423201174834pm.png

Please help me :(

Thanks Stun  working perfect.

For those who experiencing any problems follow this,

1.Install the program.

2.Go to HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\CyberLink\PowerDVD11\CustomReg > Find ( UI_UpgradeStrategy ) double click it change whatever # in it to 0

3.Start the program, register with serial and activate the program.

4.If it ask for registration online ( Name etc..) just skip it the form  and proceed.Done.

Tested and working..
